item.description:
Let's go out for brunch in our pajamas!

The staff at Tremont 647 wears pajamas and they encourage their patrons to wear them too!

Since it's winter, we can wear our coats over the pajamas, especially if you have to take the subway! Or you can put your pajamas on in the bathroom at the restaurant.

I plan to wear PJs and I don't want to be alone in the group! C'mon, it'll be fun!

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes! No-shows are a no-no! I have made a reservation for 12 people. The restaurant manager told me they can't take a reservation for a larger group, so it'll be an intimate group of people having brunch in our PJs!

I'll give my cell phone # to the people who reply yes.

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Pajama Brunch at Tremont 647!
